title: "_Computing Geographically_ Extras"
---

This website provides a collection of resources for the book [_Computing Geographically: Bridging Giscience and Geography_](https://www.guilford.com/books/Computing-Geographically/David-O'Sullivan/9781462553938) (Guilford Press, New York).

From the dropdown menus above you will find:

+ up to date links that appear in the book (mostly in footnotes) organised by chapter under the **Links** menu, and 
+ code samples used to generate draft versions of a number of the figures under the **Code for figures** menu.
